Title: ASP.Net Application Services Configuration Tool
Description: WPF tool to help users set-up Membership and Roles for ASP.Net Web Applications.
HomeWiki:
ASP.Net Application Services Configuration Tool

The project was created to provide a WPF tool to help users set-up Membership for ASP.Net Web Applications.

The application supports connecting to an existing aspnetdb database, retrieving all available application, the application's users and roles.

The application allows the maintenance of all application users (add/edit/delete) and maintenance of all application roles (add/edit/delete/membership).

Comments/Bugs/Suggestions are welcomed.

I reserve the right to answer any questions and address any bugs on the basis of my own free time.
